thread.title: Shashank Manohar set to be named BCCI chief at Sunday's SGM
thread.title_full: Shashank Manohar set to be named BCCI chief at Sunday's SGM - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Shashank Manohar set to be named BCCI chief at Sunday's SGM
text:
Former president Shashank Manohar has emerged as the sole candidate to be elected to the top post of the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI), which has fallen vacant with the demise of Jagmohan Dalmiya, in the Special General Meeting (SGM) to be held in Mumbai on Sunday.
The chair has been lying vacant since Dalmiya ... Â»
